# Nokia 7750 SR OS BGP Configuration

configure
    router "Base"
        autonomous-system 65001
        router-id 10.10.10.100
        bgp
            admin-state enable
            router-id 10.10.10.100
            group "eBGP-Peers"
                description "External BGP peers"
                type external
                peer-as 65002
                local-address 192.168.1.1
            exit
            neighbor 192.168.1.2
                description "PE-Router-2"
                group "eBGP-Peers"
                peer-as 65002
                authentication-key "s3cr3t-key"
            exit
            neighbor 192.168.2.2
                description "PE-Router-3"
                group "eBGP-Peers"
                peer-as 65003
            exit
        exit
        ospf 1
            admin-state enable
            router-id 10.10.10.100
            area 0.0.0.0
                interface "system"
                    passive
                exit
                interface "to-peer-1"
                    interface-type point-to-point
                exit
                interface "to-peer-2"
                    interface-type point-to-point
                exit
            exit
        exit
        isis 1
            admin-state enable
            level-capability level-2
            area-id 49.0001
            level 2
                wide-metrics-only
            exit
            interface "system"
                passive
            exit
            interface "to-peer-1"
                interface-type point-to-point
            exit
        exit
    exit
exit
